definitions.definition: ( military ) A hardened shelter , often partly buried or fully underground , designed to protect the inhabitants from falling bombs or other attacks .
( nautical ) A compartment for storing coal for the ship's boilers; or a tank for storing fuel oil for the ship 's engines .
( rail transport ) The coal compartment on a tank engine ; it can also refer to that on a tender engine .
Ellipsis of bunker oil ( usually plural ) .
examples: The vessel is taking on bunkers .

subdefinitions.definition: ( golf ) A hazard on a golf course consisting of a sand - filled hollow .
( paintball ) An obstacle used to block an opposing player 's view and field of fire .

definitions.definition: ( British , chiefly historical ) A large bin or container for storing coal, often built outdoors in the yard of a house .
examples: There used to be a coal bunker at the back of the house - it was demolished years ago.

subdefinitions.definition: A sort of box or chest , as in a window , the lid of which serves as a seat .

main_definition: ( military ) A hardened shelter , often partly buried or fully underground , designed to protect the inhabitants from falling bombs or other attacks .
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) A compartment for storing coal for the ship's boilers; or a tank for storing fuel oil for the ship 's engines .
( rail transport ) The coal compartment on a tank engine ; it can also refer to that on a tender engine .
Ellipsis of bunker oil ( usually plural ) .
( British , chiefly historical ) A large bin or container for storing coal, often built outdoors in the yard of a house .

definitions.definition: ( British , slang ) One who bunks off ; a truant from school .

main_definition: ( British , slang ) One who bunks off ; a truant from school .

definitions.definition: The menhaden , any of several species of fish in the genera Brevoortia and Ethmidium .

main_definition: ( US , regional ) The menhaden , any of several species of fish in the genera Brevoortia and Ethmidium .
